title: Jailkeep

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Jail a player, giving them @null for their next 2 turns. (2 turn cooldown)
- Execute a jailed player, give them copies of 2 cards you have. (1 use)

desc:
Post 1096
- You have access to the silly-people-jail channel.
- @null players may still play cards from their hand, if they play a card that isn't compatible, it isn't played and the turn is skipped.
